Posts.Content: Hi I  don't finish radiotherapy till 2nd August. Have also had 13 chemotherapy before this plus surgery.oncologist told me today I can go on holiday on 11th Aug. My insurance for myself and hubby was £91 with just travel.they deal with cancer related customers so give them a try.we all need a.holiday after all we go through.good luck.Elaine.xx
Posts.Title: Travelling abroad

Posts.Content: Hi It is an awful thing going through all these tests your life seems to be on hold and you are so young.believe me my love the  waiting for results is one of the worse things.So although you are so so worried you seem to get the strength from somewhere to cope with it all.I have found chatting to people on this site really helps.So good luck for your results on Wednesday hope all goes well.xxxxElaine.
Posts.Title: 25 years old and possible breast cancer.

Posts.Content: So sorry to hear your news.Everyone on here will help you through,i have found this site so helpful.Take care and keep positive.Love Elaine.xxx
Posts.Title: 25 years old and possible breast cancer.

Posts.Content: Hi I am finishing radiotherapy next Tuesday after lots of other treatment and am going on holiday the week after,was able to get insurance with a company called just travel who take into account people who have suffered with cancer.It cost £91 for myself and husband which I thought was a good price considering.hope you get sorted good luck.Elaine.
Posts.Title: Holiday insurance ??

Posts.Content: Hi yes this is all normal.I had exactly same as you.it is so draining.I wasn't  expecting first.day t be like that.but it was one of my worse.but now after 13 chemo and tomorrow will be my last radiotherapy  you wonder how you have got through it but you do.so keep your chin up it does get easier.love Elaine. Xxx
Posts.Title: Am i feeling too normal?

Posts.Content: Well done enjoy your hols now all the treatments are over.Take care.xxx
Posts.Title: Treatment finished :-)
